(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN For)
      (NP (NNP Tonkatsu)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, For-1)
pobj(For-1, Tonkatsu-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (VBD made)
      (NP (PRP$ our) (NN way))
      (PP (IN off)
        (NP (DT the) (NN tourist) (NN route)))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN town))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (NNP Meguro)))))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB where))
        (S
          (NP (EX there))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (JJ famous) (NNP Tonkatsu) (NN restaurant))
              (VP (VBN called)
                (NP (NNP Tonkin))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(made-2, we-1)
root(ROOT-0, made-2)
poss(way-4, our-3)
dobj(made-2, way-4)
prep(made-2, off-5)
det(route-8, the-6)
nn(route-8, tourist-7)
pobj(off-5, route-8)
prep(made-2, to-9)
det(town-11, the-10)
pobj(to-9, town-11)
prep(town-11, of-12)
pobj(of-12, Meguro-13)
advmod(is-16, where-14)
expl(is-16, there-15)
advcl(made-2, is-16)
det(restaurant-20, a-17)
amod(restaurant-20, famous-18)
nn(restaurant-20, Tonkatsu-19)
nsubj(is-16, restaurant-20)
partmod(restaurant-20, called-21)
dobj(called-21, Tonkin-22)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB However))
    (ADVP (RB ,))))


root(ROOT-0, However-1)


(ROOT
  (PP (VBG according)
    (PP (TO to)
      (NP
        (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ internet) (NN research))
        (, ,)))))


root(ROOT-0, according-1)
pcomp(according-1, to-2)
poss(research-5, my-3)
amod(research-5, internet-4)
pobj(to-2, research-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX there))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (JJR smaller) (NN restaurant))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (NP (DT the) (NNS locals) (NN favor))
            (VP (VBD called)
              (NP
                (NP (NNP Tenshin))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WDT which))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBD sounded)
                      (ADJP (RBR more) (JJ interesting))
                      (PP (TO to)
                        (NP (PRP me))))))))))))
    (. .)))


expl(is-2, there-1)
root(ROOT-0, is-2)
det(restaurant-5, a-3)
amod(restaurant-5, smaller-4)
nsubj(is-2, restaurant-5)
dobj(called-10, which-6)
det(favor-9, the-7)
nn(favor-9, locals-8)
nsubj(called-10, favor-9)
rcmod(restaurant-5, called-10)
dobj(called-10, Tenshin-11)
nsubj(sounded-13, which-12)
rcmod(Tenshin-11, sounded-13)
advmod(interesting-15, more-14)
acomp(sounded-13, interesting-15)
prep(sounded-13, to-16)
pobj(to-16, me-17)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Rumour))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (NP
        (NP (PRP it))
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (DT the) (NN restaurant))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (VP (VBN run)
                (PP (IN by)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT the) (NN wife))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT the) (NN chef))
                        (SBAR
                          (WHNP (WP who))
                          (S
                            (VP (MD can)
                              (VP (VB be)
                                (VP
                                  (ADVP (RB quite)
                                    (NP (DT a) (NN Food)))
                                  (VBN Nazi))))))))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(has-2, Rumour-1)
root(ROOT-0, has-2)
dobj(has-2, it-3)
mark(run-8, that-4)
det(restaurant-6, the-5)
nsubjpass(run-8, restaurant-6)
auxpass(run-8, is-7)
dep(it-3, run-8)
prep(run-8, by-9)
det(wife-11, the-10)
pobj(by-9, wife-11)
prep(wife-11, of-12)
det(chef-14, the-13)
pobj(of-12, chef-14)
nsubjpass(Nazi-21, who-15)
aux(Nazi-21, can-16)
auxpass(Nazi-21, be-17)
advmod(Nazi-21, quite-18)
det(Food-20, a-19)
pobj(quite-18, Food-20)
rcmod(chef-14, Nazi-21)


(ROOT
  (S (IN so)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD might) (RB not)
      (VP (VB be)
        (ADJP (JJ able)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB take)
                (NP (DT any) (NNS photos))))))))
    (. .)))


dep(able-6, so-1)
nsubj(able-6, I-2)
aux(able-6, might-3)
neg(able-6, not-4)
cop(able-6, be-5)
root(ROOT-0, able-6)
aux(take-8, to-7)
xcomp(able-6, take-8)
det(photos-10, any-9)
dobj(take-8, photos-10)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Shudder) (: ...)))


root(ROOT-0, Shudder-1)
